definition: branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Your company is a leading dealer in import and export of hi-tech instruments in China.
sentences.chinese: 貴公司是中國最大的高科技設備進出口商。

sentences.english: Science has brought mankind from a primitive form of life to the present high-tech age.
sentences.chinese: 科學把人類從茹毛飲血帶入現在的高科技時代。

sentences.english: The Company is a professional manufacturer of all types of high-tech computer embroidering machines.
sentences.chinese: 是一家專業生產各類高科技電腦刺繡機的生產廠家。

sentences.english: In here, from the slash-and-burn cultivation to the high tech agriculture, obtains the demonstration.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏，從刀耕火種到高科技農業，都得到展示。

sentences.english: US armsmakers and high-tech industries are salivating at the thought of enteringIndia's market.
sentences.chinese: 美國軍火製造商和高科技產業都在垂涎印度的市場。

sentences.english: Is a professional manufacturer of LED light emitting diode of the high-tech enterprise of electronic products.
sentences.chinese: 是專業生產LED發光二極管電子產品的高科技企業。

sentences.english: U. S. -based companies supplied a chunk of the high-tech equipment.
sentences.chinese: 美國的公司提供了大量的高科技裝備。

sentences.english: They have excellent robotics and a hi-tech production line.
sentences.chinese: 他們的機器人技術很棒，有一條高科技生產線。

sentences.english: His recent product, the high-tech light-emitting wallpaper, assures us of a revitalizing recovery.
sentences.chinese: 他的最新產品是高科技發光牆紙，保證讓你恢復活力。

sentences.english: The hi-tech industry attracts much venture capital.
sentences.chinese: 高科技產業吸引着許多風險投資。

sentences.english: I'm gonna need a hand getting used to all these high-tech gadgets we have here.
sentences.chinese: 我需要一些幫助來熟悉這些高科技“玩意”。

sentences.english: Black quilted tech fabric with tonal felt trim.
sentences.chinese: 黑色絎縫高科技面料與色調感覺修剪。

sentences.english: It is the result of Hi-tech and the traditional fine art.
sentences.chinese: 它是當代高科技與藝術相結合的產物。

sentences.english: The "Sino-American high tech projects co-operation signing ceremony" was held in Shanghai today.
sentences.chinese: “中美合作高科技項目簽字儀式”今天在上海舉行。

sentences.english: The hi-tech has put forward our production this year.
sentences.chinese: 高科技促進了我們今年生產的發展。

sentences.english: Wallach, the Yale scholar, suggesting that wars would occur more readily and that a technological arms race would develop.
sentences.chinese: 他提出高科技的軍備競賽可能讓戰爭更容易爆發。

definition: (slang) high-end, elegant, and classy/abbr. for 高端大氣上檔次|高端大气上档次
